original_title: Αν ήσουν ταινία, θα ήσουν μικρού μήκους
overview: On a terrace with the view of the concrete buildings, a plane tree and a little bit from Lycabettus mountain, two young people are flirting with the sense of love. Persistence, fear, and the view of the city will keep them together even for a few minutes. In order to understand what they really want, these few minutes are enough.
title: If you were a movie, you'd be a short film
